CustomField.description: This is a special BSP flag only that dictates whether a user should be able to search all consignments regardless of their role. A user can have Role of Admin for specific billing account and then use this option to get around access rule constraints.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a special BSP flag only that dictates whether a user should be able to search all consignments regardless of their role. A user can have Role of Admin for specific billing account and then use this option to get around access rule constraints.
CustomField.label: BSP Can View All Consignments
